data.prayer: Father, help the 2,096 believers in Qacha's Nek to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Qacha‘s Nek, Lesotho
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Qacha‘s Nek, Lesotho. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, help every believer in Qacha‘s Nek, Lesotho be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 2,096 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Qacha‘s Nek, Lesotho a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 16,000 souls in Qacha's Nek and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Qacha‘s Nek, Lesotho will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.

data.section_summary:
the state of Qacha‘s Nek, Lesotho has a population of 16,000.

We estimate Qacha's Nek has 2,096 people who might know Jesus, 12,502 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,402 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.
